TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpConnectionParams extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: An adaptor for accessing connection parameters in .

remarks.para:
An adaptor for accessing connection parameters in .
Note that the implements relation to is for compatibility with existing application code only. References to the parameter names should use the interface, not this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int GetConnectionTimeout (Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params);
.method public static hidebysig int32 GetConnectionTimeout(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the timeout until a connection is etablished.

remarks.para: Returns the timeout until a connection is etablished. A value of zero means the timeout is not used. The default value is zero.

.method public static hidebysig int32 GetLinger(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params) cil managed

remarks.para: Returns linger-on-close timeout. Value 0 implies that the option is disabled. Value -1 implies that the JRE default is used.

Docs.summary: Returns the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data.

remarks.para: Returns the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data. A timeout value of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout. This value is used when no socket timeout is set in the method parameters.

Docs.summary: Tests if Nagle's algorithm is to be used.

remarks.para: Tests if Nagle's algorithm is to be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsStaleCheckingEnabled (Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsStaleCheckingEnabled(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params) cil managed

Docs.summary: Tests whether stale connection check is to be used.

remarks.para: Tests whether stale connection check is to be used. Disabling stale connection check may result in slight performance improvement at the risk of getting an I/O error when executing a request over a connection that has been closed at the server side.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetConnectionTimeout (Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, int timeout);
.method public static hidebysig void SetConnectionTimeout(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, int32 timeout) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the timeout until a connection is etablished.

remarks.para: Sets the timeout until a connection is etablished. A value of zero means the timeout is not used. The default value is zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetLinger (Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, int value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetLinger(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, int32 value) cil managed

remarks.para: Returns linger-on-close timeout. This option disables/enables immediate return from a close() of a TCP Socket. Enabling this option with a non-zero Integer timeout means that a close() will block pending the transmission and acknowledgement of all data written to the peer, at which point the socket is closed gracefully. Value 0 implies that the option is disabled. Value -1 implies that the JRE default is used.

Docs.summary: Sets the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data.

remarks.para: Sets the default socket timeout (SO_TIMEOUT) in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data. A timeout value of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout. This value is used when no socket timeout is set in the method parameters.

Docs.param: true if stale connection check is to be used, false otherwise.
Docs.summary: Defines whether stale connection check is to be used.

remarks.para: Defines whether stale connection check is to be used. Disabling stale connection check may result in slight performance improvement at the risk of getting an I/O error when executing a request over a connection that has been closed at the server side.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetTcpNoDelay (Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, bool value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetTcpNoDelay(class Org.Apache.Http.Params.IHttpParams params, bool value) cil managed

Docs.param: true if the Nagle's algorithm is to NOT be used (that is enable TCP_NODELAY), false otherwise.
Docs.summary: Determines whether Nagle's algorithm is to be used.

remarks.para: Determines whether Nagle's algorithm is to be used. The Nagle's algorithm tries to conserve bandwidth by minimizing the number of segments that are sent. When applications wish to decrease network latency and increase performance, they can disable Nagle's algorithm (that is enable TCP_NODELAY). Data will be sent earlier, at the cost of an increase in bandwidth consumption.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
